messages.subject: Re: 100 school terms...
messages.msgSnippet: ****** But, what about socialization?! ************ I have started to ask What does socialization mean to you? or even simply What do you mean? or even
messages.messageBody:
******"But, what about socialization?!"************

I have started to ask "What does 'socialization' mean to you?" or even simply "What do you mean?" or even cocking your head to the side, raising your eyebrow(s) and going "huh???"

try it... it's fun... the looks you get... <BEG> then the stuttering <ROFL> and stammering or downright anger <ROFPIMP> *sigh* some people's kids...

Ali
